title: German AI startup Parloa triples valuation to $3 billion in latest fundraise
description: German startup Parloa has raised $350 million in a late-stage round that tripled the valuation of the artificial intelligence-driven customer service platform to $3 billion in less than a year.
content:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - German startup Parloa has raised $350 million in a late-stage round that tripled the valuation of the artificial intelligence-driven customer service platform to $3 billion in less than a year.
The Series D round, announced on Thur... [1594 chars]

title: GSI Technology to Announce Fiscal Third Quarter 2026 Results on January 29, 2026
description: SUNNYVALE, Calif., Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- GSI Technology, Inc. (Nasdaq: GSIT), the inventor of the Associative Processing Unit (APU), a paradigm shift in artificial intelligence (AI) and high-performance compute processing, providing true compute-in-memory technology, will announce financial results for its fiscal third quarter 2026 ended December 31, 2025 after the market close on Thursday, January 29, 2026. Management will also conduct a conference call to review the Company's third quarter financial results and its current outlook for the fourth quarter of fiscal 2026 at 1:30 p.m. Pacific time (4:30 p.m. Eastern Time) on that same day.

title: Matthew McConaughey wants to protect his image from AI
description: Actor Matthew McConaughey has filed recordings of his image and voice with U.S. patent authorities to protect them from unauthorized usage by artificial intelligence platforms, a representative said Wednesday.
content:
NEW YORK -- Actor Matthew McConaughey has filed recordings of his image and voice with U.S. patent authorities to protect them from unauthorized usage by artificial intelligence platforms, a representative said Wednesday.

title: Taiwan computer chipmaker TSMC's to expand investment as profit jumps 35%
description: Taiwan's TSMC, a top chipmaker, will boost spending by nearly 40 percent this year. This move follows a 35 percent profit jump fueled by artificial intelligence demand. TSMC is investing heavily in advanced chip manufacturing. The company expects continued strong demand for its leading-edge technologies.
content:

title: Matthew McConaughey Trademarks His Phrase ‘Alright, Alright, Alright’
description: Matthew McConaughey has trademarked his iconic phrase 'Alright, alright, alright,' in an attempt to stop unauthorized artificial intelligence misuse.
content:
Matthew McConaughey is trademarking his famous catchphrase "Alright, alright, alright" in a bid to stop unauthorized artificial intelligence (AI) use.

title: Software: Collateral Damage of AI?
description:
